meanings.sent1: This is the booziest drink I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the booziest cocktails at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The party was so wild that even the non-drinkers ended up with the booziest beverages.
meanings.sent4: His jokes got even funnier after a few sips of the booziest beer.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the booziest wine filled the room, making everyone's head spin.

meanings.sent1: This cocktail is boozier than the one I had yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She felt tipsy after trying the boozier version of the drink.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to prefer the boozier milk over the regular one.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the bar became even boozier as the night went on.
meanings.sent5: The boozier scent of the whiskey lingered in the air, tempting everyone to take a sip.
